Name: Dragonpath
About the game: Dragonpath is a fast-paced top-down hack'n'slash RPG with abilities tied to equipment rather than classes. The game takes place in a broken underground realm inhabited by vicious monsters and few struggling remnants of civilization. Baptised in the dragon’s fire the champion yearns for vengeance; the master’s nemesis must fall. Master the ruthless combat, carve a bloody path through the depths of this ruined world and take the fight to the wretched being festering in the abyss. Features Abilities are tied to equipped items 100+ items to find and plenty of enchants to modify them Singleplayer, local co-op (2 players) and online co-op (up to 4 players) Campaign with 15 levels and endless NewGame+ 20+ bosses and 30+ enemy types Customizable hair style Do you dare to walk the Dragonpath?
Meta Title: Dragonpath: Jul 6, 2016, Ebonscale Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Dragonpath? Check out the release date (Jul 6, 2016), developer insights from Ebonscale Games, and a complete game summary.
